/: This file is used by npm to store metadata for projects published as npm modules.
You will list grunt and the Grunt plugins your project needs as devDependencies in
this file. Running 'npm install' in the same folder as this file will install the
correct version of each dependency listed herein.
This file is also used by the PhET build process, specifically the build.sh and lint.sh
